name: Quantum Eternity
description:
Welcome to the Chronoverse, please enjoy your stay.

Quantum Eternity is a game made to emulate similar mechanics to LSD Dream Emulator for the PSX. It builds on these mechanics and adds original content to create a game that LSD:DE fans will hopefully enjoy!

The game has been released! If you find any bugs please join our discord here: https://discord.gg/4D3HtBD or leave a comment.

Alternatively you can email me at scribble.01@hotmail.com

The latest version of the game can be found here: https://gamejolt.com/games/quantum_eternity/292104

This is due to itch.io's upload limit...
